title: What's Hiding Inside This Google Pixel Case?
description: Spigen Slim Armor Pixel XL (USA Link) -  Spigen Slim Armor Pixel XL (International) -   Qi Type-C Wireless Receiver (USA Link) -  Qi Type-C Wireless (International) -   In this video I show you how to add wireless charging capabilities to the new Google Pixel XL (process would be the same for standard Google Pixel and other devices. I like to use cases that have a dual-layer design as this usually allows for the space necessary to fit the wireless Qi type receiver. Wireless charging isnt for everyone but I find it to be far more convenient especially once youve installed wireless charge pads in various locations around home and work.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
